page.title: Multimedia Objects

synopsis.code:
mal_block_media = element media { attribute type { "image" | "video" | "audio" | "application" } ?, attribute mime { text } ?, attribute src { text }, attribute style { xsd:NMTOKENS } ?, attribute * - (mal:* | local:*) { text } *,
mal_block * }

page.p: Use the media element to insert an image, video, or other multimedia object into your document. Since not all display tools will be able to display all types of objects, you can provide fallback elements in the contents of a media element. See for details on how fallback elements are handled.
